intro: Rolliniopsis discreta, commonly known as the slender rolliniopsis, is a species of flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in umbels. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its botanical interest lies in its unique floral structure and its role in local ecosystems.
